Title: Yuntum: Sanely Insane
Actors: Sayaji Shinde, Apurva Shelgaokar, Aishwarya Patil, Akshay Thorat
Plot: Yuntum (Sanely Insane) is the story of love and an illusion of love, a decay of an instrument, a boy in the dilemma with a special gift, a girl bounded by fate, a man caught in the past and the divine intervention of God.
